stimulusHtml: As part of the selection process for program placement and apprenticeship opportunities, a college requires that applicants take a standardized intelligence test. Which of the following actions must the college take for this practice to be ethical?
choicesHtml: Ensure the confidentiality of the applicants
Assign half of the applicants to take a math test to serve as a control group
Explain to the applicants that the test has predictive validity
Refrain from explaining to the applicants why they are taking the standardized intelligence test
